document_data.name: Kinterly
document_data.mainbody: '''Kinterly''' ran a magic shop in [[Zhentil Keep]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kinterly ran [[Kinterly's Magics]], one of the few recognized magic shops in the [[Realms]]. Usually he tried to buy genuine [[magic item]]s while claiming they were mundane, and sold almost-empty and non-functional magic items as if they were full-powered.
document_data.Relationship: Kinterly had two [[fire giant]] assistants and a very good relationship with the Zhentil Keep guard.
